basics.name: virtualNetworkName
basics.label: Virtual Network Name
basics.toolTip: The name of the virtual network

constraints.validationMessage: The VM Network must be between 3 and 40 characters long and contain letters, numbers and hyphens only.

basics.name: virtualNetworkAddressSpace
basics.label: Virtual Network Address Space
basics.toolTip: Defines the IP range of your virtual network. This should be in CIDR notation, for example 10.0.0.0/22

basics.name: guestVMSubnetName
basics.label: Guest VM Subnet Name
basics.toolTip: Defines the name of the virtual network subnet where Guest VM's will be located

constraints.validationMessage: The subnet name must be between 3 and 40 characters long and contain letters, numbers and hyphens only.

basics.name: guestVMSubnetRange
basics.label: Guest VM Subnet Range
basics.toolTip: Defines the network address subnet which Guest VM's will be attached to. This should be in CIDR notation, for example 10.0.0.0/24

basics.name: containerSubnetName
basics.label: Container Subnet Name
basics.toolTip: Defines the name of the virtual network subnet where the guacamole container will be located

constraints.validationMessage: The subnet name must be between 3 and 40 characters long and contain letters, numbers and hyphens only.

basics.name: containerSubnetRange
basics.label: Container Subnet Range
basics.toolTip: Defines the network address subnet which gateway container will be attached to. This should be in CIDR notation, for example 10.0.1.0/24

basics.name: webAppSubnetName
basics.label: Web App Subnet Name
basics.toolTip: Defines the name of the virtual network subnet where the webapp will be located

constraints.validationMessage: The subnet name must be between 3 and 40 characters long and contain letters, numbers and hyphens only.

basics.name: webAppSubnetRange
basics.label: Web App Subnet Range
basics.toolTip: Defines the network address subnet where the webapp will reside. This should be in CIDR notation, for example 10.0.2.0/24

basics.name: containerInstanceName
basics.label: Container Instance Name
basics.toolTip: Defines the name for Guacamole gateway container

constraints.validationMessage: The instance name must be between 3 and 40 characters long and contain letters, numbers and hyphens only.

basics.name: containerRestartPolicy
basics.label: Container Restart Policy
basics.toolTip: The behavior of Azure runtime if gateway container has stopped. Defaults to Always restart.

basics.name: gatewayWebAppName
basics.label: Gateway WebApp Name
basics.toolTip: Defines the name for Azure gateway web app

constraints.validationMessage: The webapp name must be between 3 and 40 characters long and contain letters, numbers and hyphens only.

basics.name: gatewayNetworkSecurityGroupName
basics.label: Gateway Network Security Group Name
basics.toolTip: Defines the name for network security group used for Gateway WebApp

constraints.validationMessage: The security group name must be between 3 and 40 characters long and contain letters, numbers and hyphens only.

basics.name: containerNetworkSecurityGroupName
basics.label: Container Network Security Group Name
basics.toolTip: Defines the name for network security group used for Container

constraints.validationMessage: The security group name must be between 3 and 40 characters long and contain letters, numbers and hyphens only.

basics.name: gatewayImageName
basics.label: Gateway Image Name
basics.toolTip: Defines the image to be used for Gateway container. This will default to latest available. Full list can be found here https://hub.docker.com/repository/docker/juriba/appmgateway/general

constraints.validationMessage: The image name must be between 3 and 20 characters long and contain letters, numbers and hyphens only.

elements.name: APPM_USERNAME
elements.label: APPM_USERNAME
elements.toolTip: Value from AppM application to be used in Gateway container

constraints.validationMessage: The username must be between 3 and 15 characters long and contain letters and numbers only.

elements.name: APPM_PASSWORD
elements.toolTip: Value from AppM application to be used in Gateway container

constraints.validationMessage: The password must be between 3 and 30 characters long and contain letters and numbers only.

elements.name: APPM_HEXKEY
elements.label: APPM_HEXKEY
elements.toolTip: Value from AppM application to be used in Gateway container

constraints.validationMessage: The hex key must be between 3 and 30 characters long and contain letters and numbers only.

elements.name: APPM_HEXIV
elements.label: APPM_HEXIV
elements.toolTip: Value from AppM application to be used in Gateway container

constraints.validationMessage: The hex key must be between 3 and 30 characters long and contain letters and numbers only.
